docstring:
"""
Base file upload handler classes, and the built-in concrete subclasses
"""

classes.docstring:
"""
    Any error having to do with uploading files.
    """
classes.name: UploadFileException

classes.docstring:
"""
    This exception is raised when an upload must abort.
    """
classes.name: StopUpload

classes.docstring:
"""
    This exception is raised by an upload handler that wants to skip a given file.
    """
classes.name: SkipFile

classes.docstring:
"""
    Upload handlers that have handled a file and do not want future handlers to
    run should raise this exception instead of returning None.
    """
classes.name: StopFutureHandlers

classes.docstring:
"""
    Base class for streaming upload handlers.
    """
classes.name: FileUploadHandler

classes.docstring:
"""
    Upload handler that streams data into a temporary file.
    """
classes.name: TemporaryFileUploadHandler

classes.docstring:
"""
    File upload handler to stream uploads into memory (used for small files).
    """
classes.name: MemoryFileUploadHandler
